profile.title: Web Developer
profile.description: I primarily work in web development with Next.js.

main-content.about: I have always had an interest in technology, tinkering with game server creation during my teenage years. I even did some work on Python and the web triad during high school.
main-content.about-2: But it was in 2023 that my father, a former programmer (now a lawyer), had the idea to start a micro SaaS (Software as a Service) project aimed at criminal lawyers. It was through this project that I began to evolve significantly as a programmer. Since then, I have been focusing all my efforts on improving in this field.

01.title: Criminal Sentence Execution System
01.description: Assist lawyers in their criminal sentence execution calculations, allowing them to manage their clients.
